duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical expertise to support Valmont's growing Ag solar business.
Prepare and present technical material to external stakeholders on the company's products and services.
Analyze customer needs and match to product offerings by supporting proposal development.
Act as a liaison between customers and Valmont's engineering teams in problem-solving and technical expertise.
Coordinate with utility companies requirements for interconnection with customer.
Design solar system per utility company guidelines and code.
Support product development activities through idea creation, concept validation, gathering customer insights, and support validation testing.
Travel (25%) into the field, to provide technical sales support and training to support sales efforts as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree with 6+ years relevant experience.
Experience with ground-mounted solar systems and trackers.
Experience in the solar industry, specifically in PV development projects.
Experience with NEC and solar electrical practices.
